price: Bã zã ku sãmi kyautatãwa ba, sai kun ciyar daga abin da kuke so. Kuma abin da kuka ciyar, kõ mẽne ne, to, lalle ne Allah, gare shi, Masani ne.
arabic: لَن تَنَالُواْ ٱلۡبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُواْ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَۚ وَمَا تُنفِقُواْ مِن شَيۡءٖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lan tanālū al-bira ḥattā tunfiqū mimmā tuḥibbūna wamā tunfiqū min shayin fa-inna al-laha bihi ʿalīmun
